definition: Hainan Island in South China Sea

sentences.english: The Formosan languages have great historic value.
sentences.chinese: 台湾南岛语言有着重要的历史意义。

sentences.english: Now we are preparing to make all of Hainan Island a special economic zone, much larger than the others.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在搞一个更大的特区，这就是海南岛经济特区。

sentences.english: For the rest of us, though, South Island is the world's best-kept secret.
sentences.chinese: 但是对我们其余的人而言，南岛是世界最棒的秘境。

sentences.english: Among these four islands, there can be no doubt that South Island is the least polluted and most spectacularly scenic of them all.
sentences.chinese: 四个岛中，南岛无疑是污染最少且风景最秀丽的。

sentences.english: There are many bay-drowned-valley tidal inlets and Sandbar-lagoon tidal inlets in Hainan island.
sentences.chinese: 海南岛存在着大量港湾溺谷型和砂坝泻湖型潮汐汊道。

sentences.english: The moa browsed in giant wingless herds across the southern island.
sentences.chinese: 巨大无翼鸟群飞越纽西兰南岛。

sentences.english: China is building underground submarine pens on Hainan Island and developing antiship missiles.
sentences.chinese: 中国在海南岛建立地下潜艇基地并开发反舰导弹。

sentences.english: Hainan Island was called the Pearl Cliffs, Fine Jade Cliffs, and the Fine Jade Land.
sentences.chinese: 海南岛被称为珠江悬崖，珲悬崖，和优良的翡翠土地。

sentences.english: Hainan Island is full of treasures.
Davao Islands is much oner all sides is a high-quality sandy beach, can develop seashore tour divine spot.
sentences.chinese: 海南岛四周多为优质沙滩，可开发成海滨旅游胜地。

sentences.english: This paper records 25 species of natural enemies of mango insect pests in Hainan Is- land.
sentences.chinese: 记录了海南岛芒果树害虫的天敌昆虫25种。
他们已经在海南岛安家落户。

sentences.english: What pier does the boat for South Island leave from?
sentences.chinese: 请问去南岛的船从哪个码头开出？

sentences.english: To keep fit, come often to Hainan.
sentences.chinese: 要想身体好，常来海南岛。

sentences.english: The American Harvard Endowment Fund already has large tracts of land in the SthIsland.
sentences.chinese: 美国哈佛校产基金早就在新西兰南岛有大片的土地。

sentences.english: That reminds me of the summer we spent on Hainan Island.
sentences.chinese: 那让我想起了我们在海南岛度过的夏季。

definition: Mt Cook on New Zealand South Island, national park and highest peak
Fiji, country in the southwest Pacific Ocean
Uluru, massive sandstone outcrop in central Australia
